channel.title: Small help

item.title: Small help
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Alright, i am trying to make this code give you more than 1 item at a time randomly up to 4, for farming herbs. I have tried addItem(itemAdd, 1 + misc.random(3) as well.

public void farm(int req, int itemAdd, int itemDelete, int xp){
if(playerLevel[19] < req){
sM("You need at least "+req+" farming to plant this seed!");
return;
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return;
actionInterval = 5000;
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
sM("You plant the seeds and grow some herbs.");
setAnimation(2273);
addItem(itemAdd, misc.random(4));
deleteItem(itemDelete, getItemSlot(itemDelete), 1);
addSkillXP(xp,19);
}

Read full topic
